msItem.title: Illuga saga Gríðarfóstra
msItem.incipit: Sa kongur hiet Hrijngur er Riede fijrir Damorch:
msItem.explicit: og lukum vier so þessarr Sogu af Illug Grÿdar fostra

msItem.title: Gautreks saga
msItem.rubric: Saugu þattur af GiafaRef og dala fifllunum:
msItem.incipit: Gaute hefur kongur heijtit er ri>eidj fyrir Gautlande
msItem.explicit: og so for þeir I burtt: þä mælti Refr...
msItem.note: older vers., based on AM 194 c fol., ends def

foliation.p: A later hand has added three leaf numbers in pencil, f. 1, f. 8 and f. 18, where the texts begin and end.

condition.p: There are a great number of marks on the paper. The text is, nevertheless, legible.

handDesc.handNote: The script is a mixture of chancery and kurrent (Gödel describes it as 'Halffraktur och kursiv').

decoDesc.decoNote: There is a running header reading Af Illuga | Grijdarfostra above the first saga and Af Giafa Ref | og Dalafiflunum above the second text.

additions.p: There are many marginal notes in Guðmundur Ólafsson's hand. The vast majority appear alongside Illuga saga and contain a summary of the action.

binding.p: Marbelled paper on cardboard. The spine and the corners are in white leather, on the spine, the shelfmark is imprinted with golden letters. COD. ISL. PAPP. 4:o N:o 21 .

origin.origDate: This manuscript came to Sweden with Guðmundur Ólafsson in 1681. See Gödel 'Fornnorsk-isländsk litteratur i Sverige' vol I, p.18,

history.provenance: In the list of Guðmundur Ólafsson's library brought with him to Stockholm, this item is listed. It seems that the manuscript originally contained several other texts which are now lost. They were: 'Af Hrolfe Gautrekssyne', 'af Nikuläse leikara', 'af Älafleck', 'af Nitida frægu', 'af Sigurde þógla', 'Sógu brot af Herraud og Bosa', 'Sógu brot af Hälfdäne Eysteinssyne'.

revisionDesc.change: Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Update of file based on catalogue.
Completed description with manuscript in Stockholm.
